justification: "To measure math anxiety, we administered the short Mathematics Anxiety Rating Scale (sMARS; (Alexander & Martray, 1989))."
"…we also used an adaptation of the sMARS designed to measure anxiety about reading … dubbed the short Reading Anxiety Rating Scale (sRARS…)."
"Trait anxiety was assessed using the trait component of the State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (Spielberger, 1983)."
"Test anxiety was assessed using the Test Anxiety Inventory (Spielberger, 1980)…"
"Social desirability was measured using the Marlowe-Crowne social desirability scale (Crowne & Marlowe, 1960)…"

measured_by: hard-math choice probability (HCP) in the Choose-and-Solve Task (CAST)
justification: "The critical dependent measures in the CAST were the hard math and word choice probabilities (math and word HCPs)…"

measured_by: hard-word choice probability (HCP) in the Choose-and-Solve Task (CAST)
justification: Same sentence notes that word HCP, obtained from CAST, indexes effort avoidance in the non-math (word) domain.

measured_by: average difficulty level (ADL) of hard math problems in CAST
justification: "Through the adaptive difficulty manipulation… we obtained the average difficulty level (ADL) of the hard problems that each participant encountered, which might closely track their performance."
